author: Special Correspondent
text:
The family of a college student consented to donate his organs, after he was declared brain dead at the Government Stanley Hospital.

According to a press release from the hospital, M. Surya, a second-year undergraduate student, was the third son of M. Alamelu, a resident of Tondiarpet working at a wedding hall.

Surya was involved in a motorcycle accident and was admitted with head injuries to the hospital on January 31, the release said.

On Wednesday, at 4.30 a.m., the 19-year-old was declared brain dead.

The family was counselled, and they consented to donate his organs.

His liver, heart, lungs, kidneys and corneas were donated and subsequently transplanted, the release said.
title: College student’s organs donated
